about_the_game:
(Non mandatory purchase item) Shenlong Tianyu Gift Pack
The gift package includes:
A set of infantry armor
Yu, San Jing Steel Saber Yu, Material Officer Gold Armor Yu, Wu Ben Da Guan
A set of cavalry attire
Yu, Zhangbaping Man Gun Yu, You Long Yu, Stepping on Snow without a Trace
A set of archer armor
Yu, Da Huang Nuo Yu, Yun Ling Yu, Heartless
A set of French imperial attire
Yu, Wu Ming Fan Yu, Jue Bian Yu, Han Shu
Consumables: Supreme Lion Awakening Pill * 10, Essence Cod Fish Pill * 10, Roasted Chicken Leg * 10, Goji Sauce * 10
Note: If you have purchased but have not claimed this DLC, please enter the "Start Game" interface of Steam Han Wu Emperor Zhuan. There is a "Manage My DLC" in the lower right corner of the interface. Remove all other checkmarks and only keep the hook for this DLC and the content addition package DLC to enter the game and claim it. After receiving it, check the other DLCs. Only one operation is required, and once successful, all archives will be permanently valid.
The original value of this gift pack was 3000 RMB, but it has been sold with a broken bone and there are no further discount activities.
Customer service email: 392788593@qq.com Official QQ group: 985109086 (there are strategies and senior chess players to communicate in the group)
detailed_description:
(Non mandatory purchase item) Shenlong Tianyu Gift Pack
The gift package includes:
A set of infantry armor
Yu, San Jing Steel Saber Yu, Material Officer Gold Armor Yu, Wu Ben Da Guan
A set of cavalry attire
Yu, Zhangbaping Man Gun Yu, You Long Yu, Stepping on Snow without a Trace
A set of archer armor
Yu, Da Huang Nuo Yu, Yun Ling Yu, Heartless
A set of French imperial attire
Yu, Wu Ming Fan Yu, Jue Bian Yu, Han Shu
Consumables: Supreme Lion Awakening Pill * 10, Essence Cod Fish Pill * 10, Roasted Chicken Leg * 10, Goji Sauce * 10
Note: If you have purchased but have not claimed this DLC, please enter the "Start Game" interface of Steam Han Wu Emperor Zhuan. There is a "Manage My DLC" in the lower right corner of the interface. Remove all other checkmarks and only keep the hook for this DLC and the content addition package DLC to enter the game and claim it. After receiving it, check the other DLCs. Only one operation is required, and once successful, all archives will be permanently valid.
The original value of this gift pack was 3000 RMB, but it has been sold with a broken bone and there are no further discount activities.
Customer service email: 392788593@qq.com Official QQ group: 985109086 (there are strategies and senior chess players to communicate in the group)
